title: Wiedzmin 3: Dziki Gon Krew i wino
descr: Geralt is in the southern province of Toussaint where a monstrous serial killer is targeting knights with a dark past. Geralt and his old vampire friend investigate the killer's motives.

title: Red Dead Redemption II
descr: Amidst the decline of the Wild West at the turn of the 20th century, outlaw Arthur Morgan and his gang struggle to cope with the loss of their way of life.

title: Wiedzmin 3: Dziki Gon
descr: A monster hunter for hire embarks on an epic journey to find his former apprentice before The Wild Hunt can capture her and bring about the destruction of the world.

title: The Last of Us
descr: In a hostile, post-pandemic world, Joel and Ellie, brought together by desperate circumstances, must rely on each other to survive a brutal journey across what remains of the United States.

title: Mass Effect: Legendary Edition
descr: A compilation of the first three Mass Effect games.

title: God of War
descr: After wiping out the gods of Mount Olympus, Kratos moves on to the frigid lands of Scandinavia, where he and his son must embark on an odyssey across a dangerous world of gods and monsters.

title: Perusona 5: Za roiyaru
descr: A group of high school students create a vigilante group to expose the crimes of corrupt adults but soon find themselves in the midst of a worldwide conspiracy and targeted by powerful individuals who would do anything to silence them.

title: Zeruda no densetsu: Toki no okarina
descr: A young Kokiri boy discovers that his destiny is to free the Seven Sages and save the land of Hyrule from the treacherous sorcerer Ganondorf.

title: Metal Gear Solid
descr: A crack government anti-terrorist squad takes over an obscure Alaskan nuclear disposal facility. Solid Snake is up for the task to infiltrate the facility, rescue the two hostages and thwart the terrorists' plans.

title: Wiedzmin 3: Dziki Gon - Serca z kamienia
descr: Geralt is forced by a seemingly harmless merchant with sinister powers to complete three difficult tasks for a bored immortal, once a troubled nobleman who made a deal with the devil.

title: Uncharted 4: A Thief's End
descr: Thrown back into the dangerous underworld he'd tried to leave behind, Nathan Drake must decide what he's willing to sacrifice to save the ones he loves.

title: Grand Theft Auto V
descr: Three very different criminals team up for a series of heists in the corrupt city of Los Santos.

title: Mass Effect 2
descr: After being revived from death and having to join a pro-human organization without a choice, Commander Shepard must assemble a team, battle a new threat, and make tough choices in order to save the galaxy from total annihilation once more.

title: Half-Life: Alyx
descr: A VR game of an impossible fight against a vicious alien race known as the Combine, set between the events of Half-Life and Half-Life 2. Play as Alyx Vance, humanity's only chance for survival.

title: Metal Gear Solid 3: Subsistence
descr: Enhanced version of Metal Gear Solid 3: Snake Eater (2004) with many added features; such as the free range camera, new camouflage outfits, bonus levels and a theater mode.

title: Metal Gear Solid 3: Snake Eater
descr: In 1964, a U.S. government operative codenamed "Snake" must infiltrate mountainous Soviet territory to rescue a scientist building a weapon of terrible power.

title: Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic
descr: A republic soldier, training to become a Jedi Knight, is given the task of halting the conquest of Darth Malak by discovering the location of a weapon known as the Star Forge.

title: Chrono Trigger
descr: Crono, a young boy, is thrust to adventure by destiny to destroy an oncoming threat that will destroy the world in 1999.

title: Fainaru fantajî VII
descr: A former soldier from an evil company joins a mercenary clan to fight the company he once served.

title: Uncharted: The Nathan Drake Collection
descr: A remastered collection of Uncharted: Drake's Fortune (2007), Uncharted 2: Among Thieves (2009), and Uncharted 3: Drake's Deception (2011) for PlayStation 4.

title: Bloodborne: The Old Hunters
descr: In this DLC for Bloodborne, the player-Hunter is transported to the sinister Hunter's Nightmare, a demented place where hunters who become drunk with blood are sent to.

title: Zeruda no densetsu: Buresu obu za wairudo
descr: After a century of hibernation, Link reawakens to once again save a ruined Hyrule from a great evil.

title: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim
descr: After escaping execution, the last living Dragonborn must grow in strength and power to defeat the dragons that have once again begun to plague the land of Skyrim.

title: Portal 2
descr: Many years after "Portal," Chell reawakens at Aperture Science and tries to stop GLADoS once again with the help of Wheatley, who has his own plans for the historical facility.

title: Halo 2: Anniversary
descr: Add a Plot

title: Batman: Arkham City
descr: When part of Gotham is turned into a private reserve for criminals known as Arkham City, all hell is sure to break loose, and the Dark Knight is the only one who can stop it.

title: Devil May Cry 5: Special Edition
descr: Add a Plot

title: Red Dead Redemption
descr: A former outlaw is forced by the federal government to hunt down the members of his old gang.

title: Uncharted 2: Among Thieves
descr: After being tracked down by Harry Flynn, Nathan Drake goes on a quest for Marco Polo's lost fleet. However when things take an unexpected turn for the worst, Drake must rely on those closest to him in order to find the Cintomani Stone.

title: Metal Gear Solid 4: Guns of the Patriots
descr: When the nations of the world rely upon private military companies to fight their battles for them, renegade Liquid Ocelot emerges as the head of a potent coalition of mercenary powers. Solid Snake returns to save the world once again.

title: Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas
descr: A family tragedy prompts gangster Carl "CJ" Johnson to return home, only to find it overrun by crime and corruption, which he must regain control of the streets before it gets even worse.

title: Half-Life 2
descr: Dr. Freeman is taken out of stasis by his "employer" to help rid the planet of invading aliens forces known as the Combine that entered through the portals he helped create.

title: Silent Hill 2
descr: After receiving a letter from his late wife, from Silent Hill, James Sunderland makes his way to the town in an attempt to find her.

title: Forgotten Realms: Baldur's Gate II - Shadows of Amn
descr: Jon Irenicus, a sadistic secretive powerful mage bent on revenge, captures Gorion's ward and his/her party for a diabolical experiment.

title: Planescape: Torment
descr: In the city of Sigil, the only place from which all realities of the Planescape universe can be reached, an immortal amnesiac, the Nameless One, must uncover his past, the mystery of his immortality as well as who's trying to kill him.

title: Fallout 2: A Post-Nuclear Role-Playing Game
descr: In a post-nuclear future, the descendant of an ancient exiled hero must leave his tribe in search of the Garden of Eden Creation Kit, the last chance of survival for his people.

title: Kirby's Extra Epic Yarn

title: Ghost of Tsushima
descr: Set in 1274 on the Tsushima Island, the last samurai, Jin Sakai, must master a new fighting style, the way of the Ghost, to defeat the Mongol forces and fight for the freedom and independence of Japan.

title: Kingdom Hearts HD 1.5 + 2.5 Remix
descr: A re-release of Kingdom Hearts HD 1.5 Remix and Kingdom Hearts HD 2.5 Remix on the Playstation 4.

title: Batman: Return to Arkham
descr: Batman: Return to Arkham thrusts players back into the environments of Arkham Asylum and Arkham City with a remastered graphics engine and all DLC.

title: Persona 5
descr: A group of high school students create a vigilante group to expose the crimes of corrupt adults but soon find themselves in the midst of a worldwide conspiracy and targeted by powerful individuals who would do anything to silence them.

title: Kingdom Hearts HD 2.5 Remix
descr: After the events of Kingdom Hearts HD 1.5 Remix (2013), a boy named Roxas wakes up in Twilight Town trying to make it through his last days of summer vacation when he finds out that his dreams are actually Sora's memories and he must return them to him.

title: Super Mario All-Stars + Super Mario World
descr: A compilation game that includes both Super Mario All-Stars and Super Mario World on one game.

title: P.T.
descr: The player must navigate a series of continuously looping hallways, solving cryptic puzzles, all while being hunted by a hostile apparition named Lisa.

title: Persona 4 Golden
descr: A group of high school students discover a hidden TV world called 'The Midnight Channel', an alternate reality infested with shadows that is being used to commit murder. After awakening to their Personas, the group decides to investigate.

title: Omori
descr: A young man traverses various mundane, quirky, humorous, mysterious and horrific lands with his friends in search of a missing person while confronting his traumatic past and fears.

title: Persona 4
descr: A high school student forms a group that explores a hidden world accessible through TV sets to find a connection between the "realm of shadows" and the mysterious murders in their town.

title: Kingdom Hearts II: Final Mix+
descr: Sora and friends must set out on another adventure to find his long lost friends and stop Organization XIII.

title: Wanda to kyozô
descr: A young man brings a deceased woman to a forbidden land inhabited by colossal beings said to house the power to revive the dead.
